effect: Gain 2 Æ that cannot be used to gain a relic or spell.

effect: Gain 2 Æ and suffer 1 damage. OR Gain 1 life.

effect:
Gain 1 Æ.

Gain 1 Æ.

While prepped, when you suffer damage gain 1 charge.

name: Eye Of The Maelstrom
effect: At the start of the game, set this next to a supply pile that costs 4 Æ or more. When a player gains a card from that supply pile, that player gains 1 life.

name: Well Of Despair
effect:
When a player deals 6 or more damage to the nemesis with a single spell, add a power token to this card.

At the start of the nemesis turn, the nemesis suffers damage equal to the number of tokens on this card.

name: Crones's Amulet
effect: When a player opens a breach, that player may destroy a card in hand.

name: Edible Fungus Chunks
effect: When a player gains life, they gain an additional 1 life.

name: Umbral Horn Of War
effect: At the start of the game, set this next to a spell supply pile that costs 6 Æ or more. Those spells deal 2 additional damage when cast.

name: The Broken Mask
effect: After a player finishes resolving their ability, any ally gains a charge.

name: Alchemist's Alembic
effect: Once per turn during your main phase, when you play the second gem or relic that costs 4 Æ or more, deal 3 damage.

name: Soothsayer's Pouch
effect:
Add an additional level 1 treasure to your starting deck using the level 1 treasure rules.

Your group can use an additional level 2 treasure.

name: Suppressing Pin
effect: Once per turn during your main phase, you may discard a card in hand. If you do, any ally draws a card and you may add a power token to a power in play.

name: Quicksilver
effect: When you cast a spell that costs 2 Æ or more, you may place it into any ally's hand instead of discarding it.

name: Band of Retrieval
effect: At the start of your casting phase, you may lose 1 charge. If you do, return the next spell you cast during this casting phase to your hand instead of discarding it.

name: Purified Bangle
effect: Once per turn during your main phase, you may spend 9 Æ and suffer 1 damage to place a card in play from the nemesis deck on top of the nemesis deck.
